traits.title: Traits
description: Character traits are abilities that are not tied to your race or class. They can enhance your skills, racial abilities, class abilities, or other statistics, allowing you further customization.
[Go here](rule/traits) for more information on traits.
## main/traits_all View all Traits and Drawbacks // (1,978 traits)
## main/traits_combat View Basic Combat Traits // (142 traits)
## main/traits_faith View Basic Faith Traits // (107 traits)
## main/traits_magic View Basic Magic Traits // (122 traits)
## main/traits_social View Basic Social Traits // (163 traits)
